chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:

The white iPhone 12 was purchased after the mauve iPhone 12 experienced a malfunction. Meanwhile, the mauve iPhone 12 has started working again.
The DPD service informs us that the portable device is in transit. This is a terrible service.
We are asking you to take care of this with DPD to obtain a refund for the white iPhone 12. 
Thank you for your help,

Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or electronic appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer confirms that:
 ✔ The product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
 ✔ Personal data has been deleted.
 ✔ They have confirmed that they have the return label.
 ✔ They understand that they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
 ✔ They have 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or electronic appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if eligible).

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
